mapper.insert: insert into ad(ad_num, mem_id, ad_company, ad_url, ad_requestDate, ad_price, ad_payment, ad_tid, ad_progress) values(ad_num_seq.nextval,#{mem_id},#{ad_company},#{ad_url},sysdate,#{ad_price},#{ad_payment},#{ad_tid},0)
mapper.select: select aa.ad_num from(select ad_num, rownum rnum from ad order by ad_num desc)aa where rnum=1
select * from(select aa.*, rownum rnum from(select * from ad order by ad_num desc)aa) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from ad where ad_progress=0
select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from ad where ad_progress=3
mapper.update: update ad set ad_progress=1, ad_approvedate=sysdate where ad_num=#{ad_num}
update ad set ad_progress=2, ad_approvedate=sysdate where ad_num=#{ad_num}
update ad set ad_progress=4, ad_approvedate=sysdate where ad_num=#{ad_num}
update ad set ad_progress=5, ad_approvedate=sysdate where ad_num=#{ad_num}
